code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{signInWithGoogle}from'../firebase';import'./Signup.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Signup=_ref=>{let{onSignup}=_ref;const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',email:'',password:''});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData(prevState=>({...prevState,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onSignup(formData);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"signup-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"signup-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"signup-title",children:"Sign Up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:signInWithGoogle,className:"google-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fab fa-google",children:" "})," Sign up with Google"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"signup-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",value:formData.name,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Name",className:"signup-input",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",value:formData.email,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Email",className:"signup-input",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",name:"password",value:formData.password,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Password",className:"signup-input",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"signup-button",children:"Sign Up"})]})]})});};export default Signup;
